summary: It replaces stamina pots into kind of redbull cans
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65163-1-1430071785.png[/img]

It replaces stamina pots into SkyDrink cans

This morning i was on tumblr when i saw a skyrim confession
"I wish somebody would make a mod that would make stamina potions look like cans of Red Bull, amp, or Monster."

So I did it, because why the hell not?
I only was afraid of copyright bullshit so i made it with other texture


If someone wants to use the meshes/textures and textures consider it as a modder resource, not credits to me is needed.


My other mods:
BatBuilds: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47979/?
Moon of Skyrim: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46815/?
SkyOfSkyrim: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46537/?
author: KataPUMB
